*[[IgniteNet ML-60-LW]] - ''MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60LW HEDML60LW] (2018-01-30) - ''w/ 5GHz Failover + 2GHz AP'' :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @710MHz (Quad Core) WiSoC • [https://www.balticnetworks.com/ignitenet-metrolinq-lw-60ghz-cloud-enabled-ptp-ptmp-w-5ghz-failover-2ghz-ap.html BN] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) (USB 3.0) :LAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 (1GbE) / HEDML60PRS4601 *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' (USB 3.0) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) • [[Accton]] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - X710 (?) ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" - [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601/External-Photos/External-Photos-3616968 PCB]
